connectfour

Class ConnectFourGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • connectfour.ConnectFourGame

  • public class ConnectFourGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller of the MVC design, it creates a fully functional connect four game board and makes all decisions regarding the state of the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthew Shampine

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectFourGame()
      Constructor that instantiates a new game by setting all of the default values and by setting the first player's turn to blue.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectFourGame

        public ConnectFourGame()
        Constructor that instantiates a new game by setting all of the default values and by setting the first player's turn to blue.

    • Method Detail

      • selectCfCell

        public int selectCfCell(int row,
                        int col,
                        Player player)
        Helper method that controls the logic when a user clicks on a connect four Cell. This method automatically selects the lowest row in a column of cells and checks the game status to see if there is a winner. In addition to this it also changes the turn of the player on a successful move and also checks for invalid moves.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the cell that was selected
        col - The column of the cell that was selected
        player - Who the current player is
        Returns:
        int Whether or not the move that is being made is valid or not

      • checkStatus

        public boolean checkStatus(int row,
                           int col,
                           Player player)
        Helper method that checks the game board every time a new cell is added. This method checks for all of the win conditions including horizontal, vertical and both directions of diagonals.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the cell that was selected
        col - The column of the cell that was selected
        player - Who the current player is
        Returns:
        boolean Checks to see if there is a winner or not

      • checkTie

        public boolean checkTie()
        Helper method that checks to see if the top row of the game board has been filled completely and that there are no more available moves to make.
        Returns:
        boolean Checks to see if there is a tie or not

      • getCell

        public CfCell getCell(int row,
                      int col)
        Getter method that gets a cell given a row and a column coordinate.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the cell that was selected
        col - The column of the cell that was selected
        Returns:
        CfCell Returns the CfCell if it is valid and does not exceed the bounds of the game board.

      • getGameStatus

        public GameStatus getGameStatus()
        Getter method that returns the current status of the game.
        Returns:
        GameStatus The current playing state of the game

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Getter method that returns the current player of the game.
        Returns:
        Player Which players turn it is

      • getDEFAULT_ROW

        public int getDEFAULT_ROW()
        Getter method that gets the default row of the game board.
        Returns:
        int The default size of the row

      • getDEFAULT_COL

        public int getDEFAULT_COL()
        Getter method that gets the default column of the game board.
        Returns:
        int The default size of the column

      • getCONNECT_FOUR

        public int getCONNECT_FOUR()
        Getter method that gets how many consecutive cells there must be in order for the winning condition to be met. In standard connect four this value is set to four consecutive cells of the same player.
        Returns:
        int The default number of consecutive cells of the same player to win the game
